title: Stinking Cloud
content:
Stinking Cloud Level 3 Conjuration Spell Create a cloud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures from taking actions. 10 turns 6m 18m CON Save Concentration Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Conjuration Spell

Create a cloud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures from taking actions.

6m 18m CON Save Concentration

Stinking Cloud is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Stinking Cloud is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailm
